description:
AVERAGE CIFTI FILES.

Averages cifti files together.  Files without -weight specified are given a weight of 1.  If -exclude-outliers is specified, at each element, the data across all files is taken as a set, its unweighted mean and sample standard deviation are found, and values outside the specified number of standard deviations are excluded from the (potentially weighted) average at that element.

sigma-below.description: number of standard deviations below the mean to include

sigma-above.description: number of standard deviations above the mean to include

anyOf.description: exclude outliers by standard deviation of each element across files

exclude-outliers.description: exclude outliers by standard deviation of each element across files

limit-GB.description:
restrict memory used for file reading efficiency

memory limit in gigabytes

weight.description:
give a weight for this file

the weight to use
